revised_title: Self-Similarity in a Coarsening Model in One Dimension: A Study of Domain Growth and Distribution
tldr: The authors study a simple deterministic model for coarsening in one dimension, focusing on the growth and distribution of domains. They develop rate equations for the domain size distribution and find a self-similar solution, which they validate through simulations. This work contributes to understanding the behavior of coarsening processes and the relevance of self-similarity in domain growth.
